heisigStory: Rain . . . two . . . row. This character will refer only to the inhabitants of the "spirit world," and not to moods or temperaments, for which we will learn another character in frame 2030.
koohiiStory1: After raining for two days in a row, you plead with the SPIRITS for some relief. (Adapted from johnskb,21-5-2006).
koohiiStory2: When it rains, two worlds come together and spirits can be seen in the forest, dancing in a row.
readingExamples: 霊感 (れいかん), 霊魂 (れいこん), 霊長類 (れいちょうるい), 霊 (たま)
words: 幽霊(ゆうれい): ghost, specter, apparition, phantom
